title: Video Falsely Claims ‘Teacher’ Hit Kids for Not Wearing Hijab
subtitle: Fact-Check Viral Video: A video of a man hitting girl students has gone viral on social media alleging the man to be teacher who is ‘punishing’ girls for not wearing a hijab.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video of a man hitting girl students has gone viral on social media with claims that the man is ‘punishing’ the girls for not wearing hijab.

The man hitting the kids, as they move in a queue, is assumed to be their teacher. He is seen hitting mainly the girls without the hijab.

The video is viral with various claims; some allege he is hitting girls for not wearing a hijab, while the others gave it a communal angle alleging him to hit only ‘Hindu’ girls. One of the viral claims say, "THIS is ‘Islam’ American Islamists insist that Hijab is a matter of choice. Their White feminist allies support this medieval flag of jihad. Now see for yourself the punishment accorded to little girls for not wearing a hijab. This is their TEACHER! 👨🏽‍🏫🚫"
